Q1.Question: The Modern Engineering Mathematics Book seems different between the two views. What happened to it?

Multiple Choice.A: It was opened after being closed.
Multiple Choice.B: It was closed after being open.
Multiple Choice.C: It was moved to a different location.

Q2.Question: An electronic display that was on is now off. Which object is this?

Multiple Choice.B: Right side monitor

Q3.Question: Did any object's operational status change? If so, what was it?

Multiple Choice.B: The Right side monitor was turned off.
Multiple Choice.C: The Orange Water Bottle was emptied.
Multiple Choice.D: The Modern Engineering Mathematics Book was closed.

Multiple Choice.A: It went from full to empty.

Multiple Choice.B: Closed

Multiple Choice.B: It was closed.

Multiple Choice.B: It's now open.
